ingredients: 6 Tbs. (3/4 stick) unsalted butter, cut into &nbsp small pieces
1 carrot, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch pieces
3 small red potatoes, cut into eighths
2 cups cooked turkey, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
4 oz. white button mushrooms, cut into 1/2-inch &nbsp pieces
Salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
